artist: Andrew Joseph Russell Ferdinand V. Hayden
creditline: The John R. Van Derlip Fund
description: Book "Sun Pictures of Rocky Mountain Scenery" containing thirty photographic views along the line of the Pacific Rail Road from Omaha to Sacramento by F.V.Hayden.  New York, Julius Bien, 1870.  Bound in green buckram with gilt.
title: City Creek Canyon, Wasatch Mountains, Salt Lake City
